ygData.subject: SV: SV: Paw, Diamond Dust
ygData.msgSnippet: No he dosent remember but i think we will go there tonight, and if i bring him to the scene of his crime maybe he does :-) Askur of Veeshan ... From: Alex
ygData.messageBody:
No he dosent remember but i think we will go there tonight, and if i bring him to the scene of his crime maybe he does :-)



Askur of Veeshan


----- Original Message -----
From: Alex Shimanovsky <10815@...>
To: <EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, January 10, 2000 11:34 PM
Subject: Re: SV: [EQ_Tinkering] Paw, Diamond Dust


> From: Alex Shimanovsky <10815@...>
>
> Well does your friend remember who droped it? I would geuss some sort of
> enchancer, but I donno.
> I will try to find out this weekend again, will spend sometime in PAW, but
> if it is a rare drop I would imagine the Gem Cutter would be very very
> expencive on the market and is somthing nice , maybe the first item that is
> ACTUALY good and that you can't fine somewhere else, i.e Rebreather is same
> as Fishbone earring.
>
>
>
> >From: "Zinken" <zinken@...>
> >
> >As i posted earlier, a friend of mine have found the Dimmond dust inside
> >PAW. He was then level 28 and he did only get 1 wich he sold for 150 in SK
> >zone.Maybe it drops for a number of spawn but inside is a fact.
> >This is a RL friend but he didnt know that i was looking for it :-(.
> >
> >
> >
> >Askur of Veeshan
> >
> >
> >----- Original Message -----
> >From: ALEX SHIMANOVSKY <10815@...>
> >To: <EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com>
> >Sent: Monday, January 10, 2000 5:35 PM
> >Subject: [EQ_Tinkering] Paw, Diamond Dust
> >
> >
> >> From: ALEX SHIMANOVSKY <10815@...>
> >>
> >> Well, I am a lvl 50 nec, I cleared paw maybe like 2 times already for my
> >> spell, (I know there is a short cut to the Ishiva, but clearing paw is more
> >> fun plus I wanted to get that 10 int book :) ) anyways I never got the
> >> diamond dust and i would think after clearing it for a few times it might
> >> drop.
> >>
> >> Now--> Ideas
> >>
> >> - it is very very rare and is a random drop on ALL of the Gnolls, i.e like
> >> the Paw armor , its a drop off of any gnoll.
> >> - a rare spawn gnoll either out side or inside paw. ( if he is a lvl 25
> >> ench he could not get very far into paw.)
> >> - Maybe, it would make sense of a rare spawn farrie or somthing like that.
> >> - Maybe that flying horse drops it ( i never killed it but I seen it once
> >> at lvl 35)
> >> - Grizzelnot (??) I would guess a lvl 25 enchancer can kill him , I did at
> >> lvl 25, he is sometimes low lvl, and he does go thru paw, his pathing.
> >> - maybe an aviak ?
> >>
> >> Also a clue if he (/ooc What is Diamond dust?) in SK, he probobly got it in
> >> SK. so I dont think it may have been any zones that are close to SK.
> >> ( At least now we know where to look )
> >>
> >> Also , to get more info out of that guy even if we dont play on F-Ro maybe
> >> we should creat a mule char and bug the sht out of that guy.
> >>
> >> just make a char then go /anon so he does not see your lvl. and start
> >> bugging him.
> >>
> >> also maybe he will reveal the location for some good cash ?
> >>
> >> he is lvl 25, those guys can be bought out easly.
> >>
> >>
> >>
